item.title: 🙋🏻‍♀️About me
item.description: Hey there! 👋 This is Gaoli, or you can also call me Joyce. I have cultivated a strong command over HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as some of the newer features in ES6. I also have a good command of the React framework. Currently, I am actively seeking an internship opportunity in the field of front-end development. It would be fine if the job is based on Singapore or
